questions.quote: Wait a second. Maybe there is someway we can tempt him and find out...
Jerry, I saw the doll you were talking about - not funny! This doll's much funnier. Look, it has a little bowtie, and a cute little hat.. I think it's a riot!
rock climbing? hehe.. where do you come off going rock climbing.. rock climbing? you need a boost to climb into your bed
No, . . . about how you wish it was YOU who was getting married instead of him? Feelings of resentment, hostility?
That's him! That's the man who gave me the pills in the drug store! He's no pharmacist.
Alright, alright. I'll make the necessary adjustments, alright.
Yes. You know the uh flood, and the uh lepers, and the commandments and all that.
Oh, you know these jewellers, they're enigmas. They're mysteries, wrapped in a riddle.
Do you think you could transport some stumps for me? I'll make it worth your while.
I know what you thought. They don't have homes, they don't have jobs, what do they need the top of a muffin for? They're lucky to get the stumps.
